title: [机制l其他]OldCombatMechanics——是否还怀念着1.8的战斗机制?[1.9-1.16]
author: Mithey
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mithey 于 2020-8-18 06:31 编辑 
OldCombatMechanics

--->作用
把攻击系统，食物系统，鱼钩，金PP..........恢复到1.8的时候[可以乱劈了A.A]




--->特性1.Remove weapon cooldown
2.Master toggle & per-world toggle for each module (feature)
3.Disabling player collisions (as in pre-1.9)
4.Setting tool damage as in pre-1.9
5.Disable sword sweep attack
6.Enchanted golden apple crafting & enchanted golden/normal golden apple potion effects as in pre-1.9
7.Fishing rods knockback and damage like in pre-1.9
8.Give players a shield while they right click with a sword
9.Have armour be as strong as in pre-1.9
10.Option to disable shield crafting
11.Disable off-hand
12.Make brewing stands work like in pre-1.9
13.Stop usage of elytra复制代码


--->如何食用
丢进plugins完事
